edom.edomvd: Municipal (Contact the Municipality for zoning information)

descript.abstract: This layer contains boundaries and attributes of zoning in Itasca County
descript.purpose: The zoning layer is used to assist in establishing and maintaining an understanding for the orderly management of growth for Itasca County. For more information about Itasca County's zoning policies, see the Environmental Services Department at: http://www.co.itasca.mn.us/Home/Departments/Environmental%20Services/Pages/default.aspx

cntperp.cntorg: Itasca County Department of Surveying and Mapping

The database is neither a legally recorded map nor a survey and is not intended to be used as one. The database is a compilation of records, information and data from various sources with varying accuracies and should be used for reference only. Verification of the data by qualified field survey or any other process is the sole responsibility of the user. No representation is made that data and features presented, accurately reflect true location. Itasca County or any other entity from whom data was obtained assume no liability for any errors or omissions herein. If discrepancies are found, please contact the Itasca County Department of Surveying and Mapping. Because the database is inherently complex and may not be completely free of errors, user is hereby advised to verify its work. In no event will the County be liable for direct, indirect, special, incidental or consequential damages arising out of the use of or inability to use the Database even if advised of the possibility of such damages. Specifically, the county is not responsible for any costs including, but not limited to, those incurred as a result of lost profits or revenue, loss of use of data, the costs of recovering such programs or data, the cost of any substitute program, claims by third parties, or for other similar costs. User agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the County from any and all claims, actions, suits, or damages including but not limited to, the cost of attorney's fees in the defense of any claims, arising from users use or dissemination of the Database herein.

cntperp.cntorg: Itasca County Department of Surveying and Mapping
Itasca County Department of Surveying and Mapping

procstep.procdesc: Parcel geometry was used to create the zoning boundaries where applicable.

dataqual.complete: The zoning layer includes all of Itasca County with the exception on municipalities. A zone class of M indicates the zoning is administered by the respective municipality.

horizpa.horizpar: Zoning boundary features were created from parcel data where coincident. The parcel accuracy is: Section corner and Quarter corner locations are within +- 3 feet with a 90% confidence.

attracc.attraccr: The zones have been verified by the Itasca County Environmental Service Department at the time of mapping.

dataqual.logic: Tests were performed to ensure there is no private land in the public zone. No municipal zones occur outside municipal boundaries. GIS software checks are preformed for topological consistency during the parcel mapping process. This ensures there are no duplicate lines, gaps, overlaps, undershoots, or overshoots.
